release.action: Added load test cases and JMeter plans.
Fixed issue 50: Remove systematic final attributes on methods.
Fixed issue 51: Remove static attribute on commons logging logger .
Added sample to showcase usage of the invoker and provide sample configuration.

The payload is now built from the serialization of potentially multiple inputs. This was added to support CICS containers. A CICS container-driven program can handle multiple input and multiple output structures.
